amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to implement the District of Columbia's Reproductive Health Non-Discrimination Amendment Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 41 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to implement D.C.'s Reproductive Health Non-Discrimination Amendment Act (RHNDA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 192 (Roll no. 390).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 192 (Roll no. 390).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Palmer.
